body:
im having erection from all the justice warriors in the comments.
pls dont stop.
I like taimanin asagi more
Well this was both tragic and some what beautiful...man what the heck...
@Omnidirectional tell that to the guy that says that this doesn't happen at all like saying that NTR is just a fictional word that only exist in hentai.

@Ecchimosuke I wouldn't go around talking about your personal problems on a hentai site. That is a real life issue and comparing it to anything here wouldn't make much sense since none of these stories area real, they are a work of fiction. I'm not saying it couldn't happen to people but there's no comparison to either. A man in their right mind would not be a cuck anyway in the hentai version of this the dude pretty much runs away. This doesn't happen to everyone in relationships, it can happen yeah. But that doesn't mean it happens to every single entire human being lol.

@ISpawnl it may be a fictional work of art but the truth of the matter is that this could, will, and has happed to everyone, people has a right to their opinions as long as is not about telling NTR lover to kill themselves for liking it. I had girlfriend and lost her to someone else but, I hated NTR way before that so don't say it couldn't happen to people. P.S on the upside of my tragic break up with my ex a hentai work by Shindol was being made that shows Karma at work that parallel to what happened to my ex, it's a funny old we live in try to figure out which one it is.
@Mr Flaco Same
Why isn't part 1 tranlsated?

What i like is that you people are losing your shit over hentai, where shit like this and even worse things are very common to the point where it's no use being mad at it. And if you don't like it, why are you reading this in the first place? This shouldn't be a surprise to anyone. Dear lord...

lo que yo nunca entendere, es porque no luchan por su pareja, si hay ntr, pongan al chico que peleara por ella, nose otra cosa, pero en cada ntr el chico sale mal y no pelea, o le dan chances, es lo negativo del ntr

There is no ' what if it happens to you', its a freakin fantasy doujin, in a fictional world, a fictional story. If you cant handle that without forcing yourself  IN THE VICTIMS SHOES, then turn around leave. You dont watch anime and bitch about a character getting their ass kicked and think 'what if that were me..?'
@lSpawnl but what if it happens to you?
That's fucking tragic.

@AngryTentacles I actually know a guy who has been NTRed more than three times, he's the one who corrupted most of my hentai community with NTR, and now I kinda accepted that. Trust me, I hate cuck but it's not like I'm gonna look the other way when in fact this can happen to people
Hate for NTR is understandable but to spout that on a TAIMANIN RELATED DOUJIN, youre just a fucking idiot. Either your ignorant to the series as a whole or just pathetically weak.
Taimanin Yukikaze? Fuck yeah. Also I agree she is an adorable little slut. I'd get one if I could.

I can understand the hate for NTR settings, it's not like that it happened, but the fact that it makes unsecure people think: "and what if that happens to me and the girl(boy) who I take as my first love?, What if that happens to me?" It makes insecure people feel a bit I fear and disgust, I'm insecure and yeah, don't like ntr, so I think that's what mostly people's feel.

@Iexpectedbetter please understand that Taimanin Saga is all about why feminist exist and Taimanin Yukikaze is more of a NTR like its ADV Novel, plus why do you even hate NTR? did it happened to you? is that why you hate it? cause your girlfriend left you cause you have a small dick? and was stolen from you by anther dude with a bigger dick than yours?

Truth about Profile Pics is that using female anime pics means you're a dude and vice versa.
i hope she gets fucked by karma hard..
@Gilgabo True and plus her VA is so fitting...to her
It's always the same with NTR Doujins , great Art but horrible Story (horrible as in making one feel sad , insecure and hopeless)
Why is Yukikaze always such an adorable slut?
